  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes Appointment window. Lambda 1: The ComboBox list is populated with a lambda that streams the contacts into a List. Lambda 2: Creates a Listener for the table to update the selectedCustomer and fields based on the table selection.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Pathway of FXML file
      resourceBundle - FXML file object.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the Appointment window.

    • getContactIdFromName

      public Integer getContactIdFromName(String contactName)
      Uses a Contact Name to retrieve the associated Contact ID.
      Parameters:
      contactName - Takes the Contact Name to search.
      Returns:
      Returns the Contact ID for the associated Contact Name.

    • getContactNameFromId

      public String getContactNameFromId(Integer contactId)
      Uses a Contact ID to retrieve the associated Contact Name
      Parameters:
      contactId - Takes the Contact ID to search
      Returns:
      Returns the Contact Name associated with the Contact ID.

    • getAppointmentFromFields

      public Appointment getAppointmentFromFields()
      Pulls all information from each field to create a new Appointment object.
      Returns:

      Throws:

      actionEvent - Button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if error opening Customer FXML file.

    • onDeleteClicked

      public void onDeleteClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Deletes the selectedAppointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Button is clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown is error in SQL statement or parameter.

      public void onEditClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • onFieldEntered

      public void onFieldEntered(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Fires the save button if the Enter key is pressed while the focus is in a TextField and an Appointment is being edited.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Enter key is pressed.

    • onHomeClicked

      public void onHomeClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      When the Home Button is clicked, open the Home screen and close the Appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if error opening FXML file.

    • onMonthlyClicked

      public void onMonthlyClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      When the monthly Button is clicked, shows all of the Appointments in the month chosen in the DatePicker. If no month is selected, displays the current month.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Button is clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown if error with SQL statement or parameter.

    • onNewClicked

      public void onNewClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Clears and enables all fields. If a Appointment is being edited, it will confirm that user wants to change.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Button is clicked.

    • onSaveClicked

      public void onSaveClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Performs input validation to confirm that all fields are entered properly. If the fields pass input validation, a new Appointment will be entered into the database.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Button is clicked.

    • onTableDatePicker

      public void onTableDatePicker(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      When the tableDatePicker is adjusted, it changes the Appointments displayed. Will show Appointments in the selected month or week if either selected. Otherwise displays all Appointments.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Date selected.

    • onWeeklyClicked

      public void onWeeklyClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      When the weekly Button is clicked, shows all of the Appointments in the week selected in the DatePicker. If no week is selected, displays the current week.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Button is clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown if error with SQL statement or parameter.

    • open

      public void open() throws IOException
      Opens the Appointment window.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if error opening FXML file.

    • refreshAppointmentTable

      public void refreshAppointmentTable() throws SQLException
      Updates the Appointment Table based on the DatePicker and whether All, Monthly, or Weekly is selected.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown if error with SQL statement or parameter.

    • setDisableFields

      public void setDisableFields(boolean disable)
      Sets all fields, except for Appointment ID to either disabled or enabled
      Parameters:
      disable - true disables all fields, false enables all fields.

    • setEditInProcess

      public void setEditInProcess(boolean editInProcess)
      Sets whether an Appointment is currently being edited.
      Parameters:
      editInProcess - true if an Appointment is edited; false if an Appointment is no longer being edited.

    • setFields

      public void setFields()
      Populates fields with the values from the selected Appointment.

    • setNewInProcess

      public void setNewInProcess(boolean newInProcess)
      Sets whether a new Appointment is currently being entered.
      Parameters:
      newInProcess - true if a new Appointment is being entered; false if a new Appointment is not being entered.

    • setSelectedAppointment

      public void setSelectedAppointment(Appointment selectedAppointment)
      Sets the selected Appointment with its values.
      Parameters:
      selectedAppointment - the Appointment ot be set.
